title: Hare Rama Lyrics Arrambam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Hare Rama
Singer: Tanvi Shah, Shakthisree Gopalan
MusicÂ : Yuvan
Lyrics: Pa VIjay
.
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Hare Rama Hare Krishnaa
enna seiven inimel
KOnjam beatu konjam hotu
onnaana sugamey

Hare Rama Hare Krishnaa
enna seiven inimel
KOnjam beatu konjam hotu
onnaana sugamey

Nejula pesa pesa osa koosa
meesa modhudhalaa
Kannula aasa aasa rosa
veesaa osa oodhudhu daaa.

ye ennalaa paakura
nenjum sol pecha ketkala
nee ennamo nenaikura
enna seiradhu theriyala..
ayyayyayooo.

I am gonna feel the beat let my body go
ayyayaoo..
come n feel the heat and let your body flow.

Hey megathukum boomikkum naduvula
parakuren medhakuren puriyala
ennakul naaney naan illa
adada naanaa naan illa

Ulla iruttu thirutu ilaataa
veliya ellaam theriyum velvettaa
vaa serthuko kaigala
vattam adikalaam boomiya .dadadaaa..
I am gonna feel the beat let my body go
dadadaada..
come n feel the heat and let your body flow.

Right edhu wrong edhu theriyala
yaaringa thapu thanda pannala
manasil thaan dhaam dhoom dhina naanaa
mayangi thayangi thrinjenaa

adada aadi adhirum araaathey
adanga marukkum dhinamum un koothey
yaar ketpadhu nammathaan
kaiya kattumaa kaathuthaan
tadadadom..

I am gonna feel the beat let my body go
tadadadom..
come n feel the heat and let your body flow.

hayyo raama hayyo krishna
enna seiven inimel
konjam beatu konjam hotu onnaanaa sugamye

ye ennalaa paakura
nenjum sol pecha ketkala
nee ennamo nenaikura
enna seiradhu theriyala..
ayyayyayooo.

I am gonna feel the beat let my body go
ayyayaoo..
come n feel the heat and let your body flow.

English Translation
I tried my best :)
